entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning early this evening then changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
